product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Mystique 1.0 Tent - Special Buy
long_description: The Mystique 1.0 Tent from ALPS Mountaineering has a lightweight 2-pole design that offers good headroom and ventilation for a 3-season, 1-person backpacking tent. Large mesh door allows ventilation and easy entry and exit; large vestibule offers convenient gear storage. Polyester taffeta rainfly resists UV damage and remains taut even when wet. Factory seam-sealed rainfly and floor offer great protection from the elements. Waterproof rainfly features a vent that can be zipped open or closed. The ALPS Mountaineering Mystique 1.0 Tent comes with stuff sacks, stakes and guyline; footprint sold separately. Average minimum weight specification is based on tent, rainfly and poles only. Special buy.
short_description: The Mystique 1.0 Tent from ALPS Mountaineering has a lightweight 2-pole design that offers good headroom and ventilation for a 3-season, 1-person backpacking tent.
